column5: Hi Guys:  I bought some the other day and was wondering if anyone's tried them with any success. Pinkies seem to work  well so I thought I'd give these a shot for some steelhead this weekend.  Thanx: Chris
I was wondering when they'd come out with Gulp Trout Worms...i'll have to give them a  try - that is if I can ever find any in stock!  Let us know how it goes!  Cheers, UF
Trout will eat almost anything...so yeah they should work  Tony

I already had that composed in my head and ready to type till you beat me to it Tony. lol  Best thing to do when you have a new idea is to go "buy it and try it" and if it works, keep it hush hush  Its fun sometimes watchin everyone around you scratch their heads lol
They might work.....  Rig em wacky, I find thats the best way.  F.F
